nodes.text: The Bala Trix Nebula was a nebula where the planet Bespin was located.

A galaxy map depicting the various destinations of the Star Tours travel agency is seen in the queue of the Star Tours attraction at Disneyland Paris and Tokyo Disneyland. The map erroneously suggests Bespin is in this nebula, and is also the seventh planet in its system, which is contradicted by many Legends sources.
